Package atmmachine

Class ATM.TransactionHandler

java.lang.Object
atmmachine.ATM.TransactionHandler
Enclosing class:
ATM
public static class ATM.TransactionHandler extends Object
It is a helper class of ATM class that helps ATM to execute the withdraw transaction.

  • Method Details

    • clientAuthneticator

      public static boolean clientAuthneticator(int accNum, String pin, HashMap<Integer,String> map)
      This method is used to help the ATM to authenticate the client or the account that the client wish to verify.
      Parameters:
      accNum - This holds the entered account number.
      pin - This holds the entered pin.
      map - This holds the certain HashMap.
      Returns:
      This returns true if the account number and pin matches in the HashMap.

    • getAccount

      public static Account getAccount(int accNum)
      This method is used to verify and get the specific account that is being accessed.
      Parameters:
      accNum - - This holds the entered account number
      Returns:
      - This returns the account under the account number being entered

    • isAllowed

      public static boolean isAllowed(double amount)
      This method is used to verify if the amount that the client which to retrieve is allowed
      Parameters:
      amount - This hold the withdraw amount that the client wish to retrieve
      Returns:
      This returns if the amount entered is greater than the restricted amount and less and equal to zero
